title: Nonni's Triple Chocolate Biscotti Italian Cookies - Triple Chocolate Italian Biscotti Cookies w/Dark Chocolate - Biscotti Individually Wrapped Cookies - Kosher Chocolate Coffee Cookies - 6.88 oz
features: Oh, So Good Triple Chocolate - You’ll love the tradition of Nonni’s famous biscotti Italian cookies. These delectable chocolate biscotti individually wrapped bites of heaven are dipped in gourmet dark chocolate for your ultimate satisfaction.

Dip & Dunk Your Favorite Biscotti - Try dunking your triple chocolate Italian biscotti cookies in your coffee or tea for a delectable treat any time of day. Relax and unwind with your new favorite daily tradition.

Real Ingredients For Real Satisfaction - Trust Nonni’s irresistible triple chocolate biscotti for the highest quality ingredients packed with flavor. We don’t use artificial flavoring in our famous Italian biscotti cookies.

Share This Italian tradition - Italian triple chocolate biscotti is perfect for your most special occasions. Bring these tasty treats to your next big gathering. Make people feel welcome with some good old-fashioned, old-world baking.
Limited Stock Available - We’ve got a limited supply of these chocolate biscotti fan favorites, so grab them before we sell out. Check out our brand for more Italian bites of heaven by Nonni’s.
Includes 1 box of Nonni's Triple Chocolate Biscotti. Each box contains 8 individually wrapped biscoitti.
description: Nonni’s Biscotti grew out of a true Italian tradition in the little town of Lucca, Italy. There, amongst meandering cobblestone lanes and classic piazzas, our Nonni (an endearing term for Grandma) made biscotti to share with family and friends. When Nonni came to America almost a century ago, she brought the family recipe with her. Today that same family recipe is still used to give our biscotti its light crunchy texture that is delicately sweet.
